targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
      DATE(line_item_usage_start_date) as usage_date,
      round(sum(CASE
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage') THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanRecurringFee') THEN round((savings_plan_total_commitment_to_date - savings_plan_used_commitment),8)
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanNegation') THEN 0
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanUpfrontFee') THEN 0
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage') THEN reservation_effective_cost
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'RIFee') THEN (reservation_unused_amortized_upfront_fee_for_billing_period + reservation_unused_recurring_fee)
            WHEN ((line_item_line_item_type = 'Fee') AND (reservation_reservation_a_r_n <> '')) THEN 0 
            ELSE line_item_unblended_cost 
      END),2) as cost
FROM "athenacurcfn_robo_systems_cost_and_usage"."robosystemscostandusage"
WHERE 
      DATE(line_item_usage_start_date) >= DATE($__timeFrom) AND 
      DATE(line_item_usage_start_date) <= DATE($__timeTo) AND
      line_item_line_item_type != 'RIFee' AND
      (resource_tags_user_component in ($component)) AND 
      (resource_tags_user_environment in ($environment))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY cost, usage_date

      DATE(line_item_usage_start_date) as usage_date,

            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage') THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost

SELECT
      DATE(line_item_usage_start_date) as usage_date,
      round(sum(CASE
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage') THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanRecurringFee') THEN round((savings_plan_total_commitment_to_date - savings_plan_used_commitment),8)
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanNegation') THEN 0
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanUpfrontFee') THEN 0
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage') THEN reservation_effective_cost
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'RIFee') THEN (reservation_unused_amortized_upfront_fee_for_billing_period + reservation_unused_recurring_fee)
            WHEN ((line_item_line_item_type = 'Fee') AND (reservation_reservation_a_r_n <> '')) THEN 0 
            ELSE line_item_unblended_cost 
      END),2) as cost
FROM "athenacurcfn_robo_systems_cost_and_usage"."robosystemscostandusage"
WHERE 
      DATE(line_item_usage_start_date) >= DATE($__timeFrom) AND 
      DATE(line_item_usage_start_date) <= DATE($__timeTo) AND
      line_item_line_item_type != 'RIFee' AND
      (resource_tags_user_component in ($component)) AND 
      (resource_tags_user_environment in ($environment))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY cost, usage_date

SELECT
      CASE
            WHEN resource_tags_user_component in ($component) AND resource_tags_user_component != '' THEN resource_tags_user_component
            WHEN product_servicename = 'Amazon Virtual Private Cloud' THEN 'VPC'
            WHEN line_item_unblended_cost < 0.01 THEN 'Other'
            WHEN product_servicename IS NOT NULL AND product_servicename != '' THEN replace(replace(replace(product_servicename,'Amazon',''),'AWS',''),' ','')
            ELSE 'Other'
      END as component,
      round(sum(CASE
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage') THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanRecurringFee') THEN round((savings_plan_total_commitment_to_date - savings_plan_used_commitment),8)
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanNegation') THEN 0
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanUpfrontFee') THEN 0
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage') THEN reservation_effective_cost
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'RIFee') THEN (reservation_unused_amortized_upfront_fee_for_billing_period + reservation_unused_recurring_fee)
            WHEN ((line_item_line_item_type = 'Fee') AND (reservation_reservation_a_r_n <> '')) THEN 0 
            ELSE line_item_unblended_cost 
      END),2) as cost
FROM "athenacurcfn_robo_systems_cost_and_usage"."robosystemscostandusage"
WHERE 
      DATE(line_item_usage_start_date) >= DATE($__timeFrom) AND 
      DATE(line_item_usage_start_date) <= DATE($__timeTo) AND
      line_item_line_item_type != 'RIFee' AND
      (resource_tags_user_component in ($component)) AND 
      (resource_tags_user_environment in ($environment)) AND
      line_item_unblended_cost > 0.01
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY cost DESC

SELECT
      DATE(line_item_usage_start_date) as usage_date,
      CASE
            WHEN resource_tags_user_component in ($component) AND resource_tags_user_component != '' THEN resource_tags_user_component
            WHEN product_servicename = 'Amazon Virtual Private Cloud' THEN 'VPC'
            WHEN line_item_unblended_cost < 0.01 THEN 'Other'
            WHEN product_servicename IS NOT NULL AND product_servicename != '' THEN replace(replace(replace(product_servicename,'Amazon',''),'AWS',''),' ','')
            ELSE 'Other'
      END as component,
      round(sum(CASE
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage') THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanRecurringFee') THEN round((savings_plan_total_commitment_to_date - savings_plan_used_commitment),8)
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanNegation') THEN 0
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanUpfrontFee') THEN 0
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage') THEN reservation_effective_cost
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'RIFee') THEN (reservation_unused_amortized_upfront_fee_for_billing_period + reservation_unused_recurring_fee)
            WHEN ((line_item_line_item_type = 'Fee') AND (reservation_reservation_a_r_n <> '')) THEN 0 
            ELSE line_item_unblended_cost 
      END),2) as cost
FROM "athenacurcfn_robo_systems_cost_and_usage"."robosystemscostandusage"
WHERE 
      DATE(line_item_usage_start_date) >= DATE($__timeFrom) AND 
      DATE(line_item_usage_start_date) <= DATE($__timeTo) AND
      line_item_line_item_type != 'RIFee' AND
      (resource_tags_user_component in ($component)) AND 
      (resource_tags_user_environment in ($environment))
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY cost, usage_date

SELECT
      CASE
            WHEN resource_tags_user_environment != '' THEN resource_tags_user_environment
            WHEN product_servicename = 'Amazon Virtual Private Cloud' THEN 'shared'
            WHEN product_servicename = 'AmazonCloudWatch' THEN 'shared'
            ELSE 'other'
      END as environment,
      round(sum(CASE
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage') THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanRecurringFee') THEN round((savings_plan_total_commitment_to_date - savings_plan_used_commitment),8)
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanNegation') THEN 0
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanUpfrontFee') THEN 0
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage') THEN reservation_effective_cost
            WHEN (line_item_line_item_type = 'RIFee') THEN (reservation_unused_amortized_upfront_fee_for_billing_period + reservation_unused_recurring_fee)
            WHEN ((line_item_line_item_type = 'Fee') AND (reservation_reservation_a_r_n <> '')) THEN 0 
            ELSE line_item_unblended_cost 
      END),2) as cost
FROM "athenacurcfn_robo_systems_cost_and_usage"."robosystemscostandusage"
WHERE 
      DATE(line_item_usage_start_date) >= DATE($__timeFrom) AND 
      DATE(line_item_usage_start_date) <= DATE($__timeTo) AND
      line_item_line_item_type != 'RIFee' AND
      (resource_tags_user_component in ($component)) AND 
      (resource_tags_user_environment in ($environment))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY cost DESC

            WHEN resource_tags_user_environment != '' THEN resource_tags_user_environment

SELECT
      CASE
            WHEN product_servicename = 'Amazon Virtual Private Cloud' THEN 'VPC'

      round(sum(CASE

            ELSE line_item_unblended_cost 
      END),2) as cost
FROM "athenacurcfn_robo_systems_cost_and_usage"."robosystemscostandusage"
WHERE
